remarks: The integral of an integrable function is a complex number.  This is Metamath 100 proof #86.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2014.)
statement:
itgmpt.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgcl $p |- ( ph -> S. A B _d x e. CC ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
